title: Case Law as Data: Prompt Engineering Strategies for Case Outcome Extraction with Large Language Models in a Zero-Shot Setting
details: G Zambrano - Law, Technology and Humans, 2024
abstract: This study explores the effectiveness of prompt optimization techniques for legal case outcome extraction using Large Language Models (LLMs). Two state-of-the-art LLMs, LLaMA3 70b and Mixtral 8x7b, are used in a zero-shot data extraction task on …
